meta.title: Home - SAU

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme10

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

div.div: We are comprised of four districts: the Hanover, Norwich and Dresden school districts, as well as School Administrative Unit (SAU) 70.

img.alt: student sits at desk and reads

div.div: Our schools actively seek to inspire, appreciate, and reward excellence and creativity among students and staff.

img.alt: two girls sitting on the floor reading a book

div.div: "In a climate of ever-increasing economic and educational pressures, we will continue to refine and evaluate our programs to meet the high standards we demand for our children's education, while being mindful of the financial costs to our community." - Kelly McConnell, Hanover Board Chair

img.alt: School Board member Neil Odell at the Norwich Deliberative Session

div.div: SAU Departments provide district-wide services to the Hanover, Norwich and Dresden School Districts.
SAU 70 responds to the community in its commitment to provide students with the opportunity to develop intellectually, emotionally, physically, and socially.

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

img.style: color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-size: 20px; font-family: lato, sans-serif; margin: 10px 0px 0px;

A link for public participation is embedded in the "Call to Order" section of the agenda.

div.a: SAU 70 School Board Retreat POSTPONED: TBD

div.p: This meeting will be held remotely via Zoom.
A link for public participation is embedded in the "Call to Order" section of the agenda.
This meeting will be held remotely via Zoom.

A link for public participation is embedded in the "Call to Order" section of the agenda.
This meeting will be held remotely via Zoom.
A link for public participation is embedded in the "Call to Order" section of the agenda.

SAU 70's Dresden District is the nation's first interstate school district, comprising of the Richmond Middle School and Hanover High School, with students from the towns of Norwich, Vermont, and Hanover, New Hampshire.

img.alt: Ariel photo of the new Hanover High School turf field

div.p: SAU 70 schools are an active learning community that provides broad academic and co-curricular programs. We engage students' minds, hearts and voices so that they become educated, caring and responsible adults.Learn More

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p:
Our campuses will remain closed and distance learning will continue for the remainder of the school year.
The SAU Office will be staffed Monday - Friday 9AM-3PM. Thank you for your understanding during these times.

Our playground equipment is not sanitized. Play at your own risk.
This includes our field and outdoor facilities.
